definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Reports the same month from Laos revealed the ongoing poaching of tiger.
sentences.chinese: 當月老撾報道稱，偷獵老虎的行徑仍沒有得到遏制。

sentences.english: It reports six or more account changes in a given month.
sentences.chinese: 當月申報改帳累計達六筆以上者。

sentences.english: The class fills to whether must be after tone rests complemental that month, lie between a month to disable?
sentences.chinese: 調休後補班是否必須在當月補足，隔月無效？

sentences.english: You will be paid in arrears every month by cheque or bank transfer.
sentences.chinese: 你的工資會在當月的下個月通過支票或銀行轉賬發放。

sentences.english: The design and service fee should be paid in the mid-month since the second month.
sentences.chinese: 第二個月起爲每月的月中支付當月設計服務費用。

sentences.english: It reports four or more account changes in a given month.
sentences.chinese: 當月申報改帳累計達四筆以上者。

definition: to quote a price/seller's first offer
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
